description:
Make sure to disable default controls unless you want two keys to do the same action.

Actions have two versions. `custom` allow the movement keys to be changed to what ever you would like. `presets` provide a common key-bindings that can be selected from a list.

### Available Presets:

##### `WASD`
-	W: Up
-	A: Left
-	S: Down
-	D: Right
-	Space: Jump

##### `ZQSD`
-	Z: Up
-	Q: Left
-	S: Down
-	D: Right
-	Space: Jump

##### `Numpad` (Num lock must be disabled)
-	Numpad Up: Up
-	Numpad Left: Left
-	Numpad Down: Down
-	Numpad Right: Right
-	Numpad Return/Enter: Jump

##### `IJKL`
-	I: Up
-	J: Left
-	K: Down
-	L: Right
-	Return/Enter: Jump
name: BehaviorRemapper
shortDescription: Quickly remap Behavior controls to different keys.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Allows for the controls of a Top-Down behavior to be re-mapped via a single action.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: RemapForTopdown

eventsFunctions.description: Remaps Top-Down behavior controls to a custom control scheme.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Remap Top-Down controls to a custom scheme
eventsFunctions.name: SetCustom
eventsFunctions.sentence: Remap controls of _PARAM0_: Up: _PARAM2_, Left: _PARAM3_, Down: _PARAM4_, Right: _PARAM5_

eventsFunctions.description: Remaps Top-Down behavior controls to a preset control scheme.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Remap Top-Down controls to a preset
eventsFunctions.name: SetPreset

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Allows for the controls of a platformer behavior to be re-mapped via a single action.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: RemapForPlatformer

eventsFunctions.description: Remaps Platformer behavior controls to a custom control scheme.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Remap Platformer controls to a custom scheme
eventsFunctions.name: SetCustom
eventsFunctions.sentence: Remap controls of _PARAM0_: Up: _PARAM2_, Left: _PARAM3_, Down: _PARAM4_, Right: _PARAM5_, Jump: _PARAM6_

eventsFunctions.description: Remaps Platformer behavior controls to a preset control scheme.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Remap Platformer controls to a preset
eventsFunctions.name: SetPreset
